hero.title: KeySoundLab
hero.subtitle: Test keyboard switch sounds in real-time

realtime.title: Real-time Sound
realtime.description: Hear your selected switch sound instantly when you type on your physical keyboard.

switches.title: Various Switches
switches.description: Supports various mechanical switch sounds including Cherry MX, Gateron, and more.

visual.title: Visual Feedback
visual.description: See which keys you're pressing on an 87-key TKL layout.

keyTypes.title: Key Type Sounds
keyTypes.description: Stabilizer keys like spacebar and enter have distinct sounds.

step1.title: Select Switch
step1.description: Choose the switch you want to test from the sidebar.

step2.title: Start Audio
step2.description: Click the "Start Audio" button to activate sound.

step3.title: Start Typing
step3.description: Type on your keyboard to hear the selected switch sound.
